snippet.title: Disney Guilty Party Trailer
snippet.description: Created by Wideload Games, Disney Interactive Studios' Chicago development studio, Disney Guilty Party tells the thrilling tale of the Dickens Detective Agency as they solve crimes set in motion by the master criminal known as Mr. Valentine.  Up to four players can solve crimes all over the world to unlock the secrets of Mr. Valentine's grand scheme as the Wii Remote is transformed into classic detective tools, such as a magnifying glass, flashlight, lock-pick, fingerprint kit, and more.
